plot: Jack was a child when his older sister Claire left home and never returned. Twenty years have passed and she has not been seen or heard from--until tonight.
title: Jack Heart Jump
plot_es: Jack was a child when his older sister Claire left home and never returned. Twenty years have passed and she has not been seen or heard from--until tonight.
plot_en: Jack was a child when his older sister Claire left home and never returned. Twenty years have passed and she has not been seen or heard from--until tonight.
